title: Climbed out of bronze with singed ama
body:
After spending about 50 ranked games on singed I managed to carry myself out of oce bronze starting at bronze 3 and have peeked at silver 2 this season but tilted hard after a long holiday and had some issues (currently a 320k singed main)

Singed is not a horrible champion to carry with and isn't a brain dead one either he is a decision making champion.

I'm currently sitting on a 64.5% win rate on singed (111/61) with a 3.8 kd on singed (my second most played is nasus with 33 games)

(P.s. if you have versed me before I don't feel sorry)

Ask me anything :)

replies.body: about your name.. I didnt know Singed gives free candy.. #startschasingyoulikeaboostedbonobo

> [{quoted}](name=RonyStark,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HVEQQFd2,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-10-12T02:45:26.604+0000)
>
> about your name.. I didnt know Singed gives free candy.. #startschasingyoulikeaboostedbonobo

remove that hash
I took inspiration off a custom skin I found that has singeds poison trail replaced with jellybeans.

Do many players in your opinion know the number 1 rule in LoL?

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/xI08hBSoUHs/maxresdefault.jpg
His name is to be blamed
Ahh yes , a very deceptive name indeed

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HVEQQFd2,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-10-12T04:02:20.154+0000)
>
> Ahh yes , a very deceptive name indeed

Yea I wanted to get the name "chase the singed" but it was taken so I just went with chase4candy

While I got ya here, are you guys going to rework singeds passive soon? Us singed mains have been asking, begging and crying for this for 5 years now
I wouldn't count on it to be honest. Anyone who joined after season 3/4 (pretty much 50-66% of OCE) would rarely even see Singed. He's been in a bad spot for a long time.

> [{quoted}](name=FA Quaker,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HVEQQFd2,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2016-10-13T05:46:24.001+0000)
>
> I wouldn't count on it to be honest. Anyone who joined after season 3/4 (pretty much 50-66% of OCE) would rarely even see Singed. He's been in a bad spot for a long time.

In patch 6.18 he had the highest win rate for toplane when a na challenger player figured out that righteous glory is the best first item for singed. singed by his own has been doing well towards the end of season 6 because of how much every other toplaner has been nerfed. eg. at the start of the season everyone would of agreed that gnar counters singed but now because he was nerfed alot it is an even matchup.

Not to many, lots of people just under rate singeds damage and end up dead because of it.

The other part of that rule is: even if you kill him it's not worth it for your team.
tfw you decayed but you don't decay if you're not Plat, Diamond, Master, or Challenger.
Tilted a bit kept playing for some reason and got demoted*
Can you believe its not butter?
Hello, I want to get out of bronze... :')

> [{quoted}](name=Archanjewl,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HVEQQFd2,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-10-13T09:28:05.599+0000)
>
> Hello, I want to get out of bronze... :')

Play simple champions with low skill caps (that's why nasus is godlike in low elo) figure out that you are probally bad at one of your mains and stop playing them in ranked (for me this is gp) play champions that punish your enemies mistakes/positioning errors like sej.
Learn lane control (yet another reason why nasus is so good) push the wave whenever your laner just based, only use teleport if the minion wave is crashing into your tower.
Play late game champions like nasus to abuse how long low elo games go for.
Learn the importantance of farm

The biggest tip I have is never talk in chat unless it is going to help your team win, and don't be that guy writing a bloody novel in all chat.

> [{quoted}](name=Ascalon127,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HVEQQFd2,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-10-13T07:58:28.314+0000)
>
> Since ur a singed main what do u think counters singed? I think he's really annoying to deal with cause all he does is tower hugs and then when i go for a little bit of farm under his tower, he flips me into the tower range and i die. What do you think i could do to not feed a singed
> 
> Thnx{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 
> {{champion:27}}

You never want to go near a singeds tower the risk of him popping ghost and flinging you under tower is too high.

Champions that counter singed hard are: kennen, jayce, nasus, galio, jarvan

Kennen is a hard lane to deal with for singed because of kennens raw damage.

Jayce because of how sticky and long range he is.

Nasus because he can just rush spirit visage and ignore singeds damage.

Galio because he can just rush abyssal or spirit visage and ignore singed.

Jarvan because most singed players take ghost and jarvan shuts down champions that take ghost over flash.

Note singed can win these lanes if the the singed plays the fight well.

I've played singed in Aram and he is a LOT of fun, I might try him out on the rift sometime soon... Do you proxy farm with him much?
If so, do you go for boots/vision early on to avoid getting caught out? Or do you tank early so you can sustain your way out of an uneven fight?
Who in your opinion is the most painful champion to vs top lane when you're playing singed?

A good Nasus is extremely hard for singed to deal with. Nasus outscales singed, if singed trys to proxy nasus he can freeze the wave by tanking the wave and free stack with his passive life steal, singed pushing the wave is bad verse nasus (which most singed players do) since he can farm under tower easily and wouldn't get denied at all, if singed trys to mess with nasus under tower he can wither him zone singed away.

Singed vs nasus completely changes singeds playstyle, he wants to be aggressive. It changes singeds build because he cannot build zz'rot portal since nasus can just sit at the portal for 2 minutes and get free stacks from the voidspawns, singed cannot build tear or rod of ages (singed mains never build it anyways) because there's no point building a scaling item verse an infinitely scaling champion.

Honestly when someone picks singed against me in a ranked game I just default to nasus since I know this matchup inside out and it is normally a free win for me as I know the limits of singed, his mana costs at each rank, his damage at every point in the game,

Nasus outscales singed, if singed trys to proxy nasus he can freeze the wave by tanking the wave and free stack with his passive life steal, singed pushing the wave is bad verse nasus (which most singed players do) since he can farm under tower easily and wouldn't get denied at all, if singed trys to mess with nasus under tower he can wither him zone singed away.

It changes singeds build because he cannot build zz'rot portal since nasus can just sit at the portal for 2 minutes and get free stacks from the voidspawns, singed cannot build tear or rod of ages (singed mains never build it anyways) because there's no point building a scaling item verse an infinitely scaling champion.

> Honestly when someone picks singed against me in a ranked game I just default to nasus since I know this matchup inside out and it is normally a free win for me as I know the limits of singed, his mana costs at each rank, his damage at every point in the game,

i think the only time singed beats nasus is if he gets a rylais quick enough

> [{quoted}](name=Mesprit,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HVEQQFd2,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-10-12T21:28:59.510+0000)
>
> i think the only time singed beats nasus is if he gets a rylais quick enough

The only time singed can beat a nasus is in the early game with a kill pressure setup, in mid game it is a 50/50 fight if singed has ghost and ult, late game singed will most likely always loose to nasus.

why does everyone get cocky against singed? like i've played a fair amount of singed and EVERYONE gets too cocky. singed has a lot of kill pressure at 6. how often does this happen in your experience?
Because of singeds low play rate people just assume he is a bad champion and doesn't do anything other than run.
Why do nipples harden in cold weather?
Ask your mother
